try_again_message: From here you can try again
bouns-modal-info: Order the verses before the time and get 15 points
bouns_result_message: Woohoo!  You got your daily reward! See ya tomorrow, buddy! And pleeeease take care of my sweet little chickie
bouns_verse_title: Your Daily Reward: Get the Verse
question: Question
verses: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want
Trust in the Lord with all your heart
For God so loved the world
We love because He first loved us
I can do all things through Christ
bounsVerses: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding
In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth
The Lord is my shepherd I shall not want
O Lord do not rebuke me in Your anger nor chasten me in Your hot displeasure
Preserve me O God for I trust in You
I will love You O LORD my strength
The heavens declare the glory of God and the firmament shows His handiwork
The earth is the Lords and all its fullness the world and those who dwell therein
To You O LORD I lift up my soul
I will bless the Lord at all times His praise shall continually be in my mouth
I waited patiently for the Lord and He inclined to me and heard my cry
Blessed is he who considers the poor the Lord will deliver him in time of trouble
God is our refuge and strength a very present help in trouble
Make a joyful shout to God all the earth
He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty
Make a joyful shout to the Lord all you lands
Serve the Lord with gladness come before His presence with singing
Oh give thanks to the Lord for He is good for His mercy endures forever
I will lift up my eyes to the hills from whence comes my help
I was glad when they said to me Let us go into the house of the LORD
Out of the depths I have cried to You O LORD
Behold how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity
He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds
info: Did you know that Jesus had 12 disciples
Did you know that Jesus sent out 70 apostles
Did you know the first book of the Bible is Genesis
Did you know that the Apostle Paul wrote 13 letters
Did you know that the Bible contains over 300 prophecies fulfilled in Jesus ?
Did you know that the miracle of feeding the crowds happened twice? (Matthew 14 & 15)
Did you know that the first martyr in the Christian Church was Saint Stephen?
Did you know that the Bible is the most translated book in history?
Did you know that the Bible is divided into two parts: the Old Testament before Christ, and the New Testament after His birth?
Did you know that the Old Testament contains 46 books, and the New Testament contains 27 books?
